title: Justice, Change, and Respect
description:
Protests have swept the streets across the country and around the world. Host Nikki Boyer talks to her friend CJay about how it felt to come together in unity at the Los Angeles protests and how we find hope in moments like this.

Donate to the NAACP Legal Defense Fund
